snippet: The Spanish motorcycle rider Marc Márquez, 21, is a phenomenon known for his aggressive racing techniques, but he has maintained a humble off-track persona.
abstract: Spanish motorcycle rider Marc Marquez is phenomenon known for his aggressive racing techniques, but he has maintained a humble off-track persona; captures his 11th victory in 12 MotoGP races in 2014 after winning British Grand Prix.
lead_paragraph: The Spanish motorcycle rider Marc Márquez, 21, is a phenomenon known for his aggressive racing techniques, but he has maintained a humble off-track persona.

headline.seo: Marc Márquez Continues Dominance With British Grand Prix Win
headline.main: Sport Turns a Corner and Sees Its Future, at 200 M.P.H.
headline.print_headline: Sport Turns a Corner and Sees Its Future, at 200 M.P.H.
